235a8: gzhonur gyur par bcas pa sar dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / song rigs kyi bu yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji lta
235b1: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ji ltar smon par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'drang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su rdzogs pa
235b2: sbyang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu'i
235b3: smon lam gyi khyang par ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la yang med do/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsrub pa ni tshad med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub/
235b4: sems dpa'i yon/ na gyi khyad par thams cad par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag thig brag/ gi yum lta bu'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zag
235b5: khrig brgya phrag stong la gdams ngag ston pa'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i
235b6: 'jig rten gyi khams su ming gi 'khor mes rnam par byas par gyur ba'o/ / 'dam dpal gzhon nur byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtam gyi skyes bur gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal ban
235b7: rlung gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing stong pa'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni chos thams cad yang dag baji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ chos zab ma'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa/
235b8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rnam par thar pa thams cad kyi tshul thams cad la ring du song ba'i spyod yul dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba kun tu bzang po la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu dge pa'i bshes
236a1: gnyen den khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'phel bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po rab tu sgrub pa'o// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bags gan
236a2: ston pa'o/ / yon tan thams cad la yang dag par sprul pa'o// smon lamatshan po'i dra ba thams cad du 'jug pa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i thams cad la rab tu gzhog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams
236a3: cad kyi gsang ba thos par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o// sngon gyi tshe'i gnas su skal pa 'thun par spyad pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod da ltar yang 'jam
236a4: dpal gyi rkang pa'i drung na 'dug gis yon tan gyi gdams ngag thams cad thob par bya ba la yongs su skyob ma skyed cig yongs su sgyid lug par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor bzangs khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes
236a5: gnyen ji snyed cig mthong ba dang / spyod pa'i sgo ji snyed cig thos pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul ji skad cig la zhugs pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par ji snyed pa cig khong du chud pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal
236a6: gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs su blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems
236a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drang
236a8: nas song ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer brgya rtsa bcu kun tu rgyus te/ phyogs kyi gnas yid bde ba mngon tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhig na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sems shing rnam
236b1: paraska/ bas bajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar mos shing / smon la grang bar dga' bas sdod cing 'dug pa dang / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// dpag chad brgya rtsa bcu'i'aphar la nas lag par
236b2: ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer yid bde ba mngon du 'gyur ba na 'dug pa'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// dad pa'i dbang po dang mi ldan pa/ sems skyong
236b3: can/ bsam pa zhum pa can sbyor ba'i bor ba/ brtson 'grus ldog pa/ yon tan chung zad kyis dga' bar rtsib/ dge ba'i rtsa bgacig la zhen par gnas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa lam
236b4: sa pa/ dag pa'i bags gnyen gyis yongs sum bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis ni chos nyid 'dis bu yongs sugs par dbya ba dang tshul 'dis bu dang / spyod la 'di ga zu
236b5: gnas 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes par bya ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ yid ches par bya ba 'am/ brtag par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am
236b6: thob par bya bar mi nus so/ / zhes te des de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa dang / yang dag par skul ba dang / bzeng bstod pa dang / dga' bar byas te chos kyi sgo grangs med pa dang ldan par byas nas ye shes
236b7: mtha' yas pa'i snang ba chen po thob par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang / spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yegs mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa
236b8: byas te/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas/ bdag gi yul la'ang rab tu gzhag ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi drung nas song ngo //
237a1: gan ma panapa / sa ga pa pas bya ba las ldang pas brtan pa sa / ba /
237a2: sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
237a3: khams kyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs bsags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la 'thun par
237a4: 'dzin pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi drung du bsam pa mnyam pa ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya ba ste/ yid mi 'byung ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams ca
237a5: kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i tshul rgya mtsha'i rjes su song ba snying rje chen po'i bsam pa rgya mtsho las yang dag par byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i chen po'i tshul gyi sprin gyi ma 'grob thams cad rnam
237a6: par snang bar byas pa/ dga' bar chen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i lus dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po la rab tu zhi bar rnam par spyod pa/ sgo thams cad nas lhag par 'phro ba'i gtong
237a7: ba'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan rab tu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la
237a8: brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang bas gribs shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
237b1: pa lazhugs pasang sa rgyas thams cad thams kyi rgya la rgyam ma'ang du chad du/ da bzhin gagags pa thams cad byams rgya'abar ba chul rgyamam 'das sus dang/ 'dag rten pastag nas thams ca da gzugs padadas sa
237b2: ston pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshol zhugs pa/ bskal bathams cad byang chub sa mas dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ thams cadan khyen pa nyid kyi sa snang
237b3: b.rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sams dpa'i dbang po thams cad rnam par 'phel ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam snang bar rab tuthob pa/ phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul la
237b4: rab tu 'gas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ zhing gi rdul thams cad la snang ba rab tu grub pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi don bya ba la rgyud dang mi 'thun pa med pa rjes su song // sgrib pa'i g.yang sa'i rithams cad rnam par 'bor ba/
237b5: sgrib pa pad pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pasa'i ga'i kun tu gnas pa'i chos kyi byings kyi snying pa can larab tu ni par rnam par spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod lu rjes su
237b6: tshal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pade/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tub zangs pa'i snod yul la rnam par dpyod pa cing / 'dug par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am
237b7: bzang po'i ming thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang / tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang gnas pa'i khyad par thos pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'byung ba'i
237b8: lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i sa'i tshul gyi d+had thos pa dang / sa'i sogs thos pa dang / sa thob par byed pa'i shugs thos pa dang / sa yongs su gnan pa thos pa dang / sa la gnas pa thos pa dang / sa sngon
238a1: ngu 'dor bas rnam par gnon pa thos pa dang / sa'i spyod yul thos pa dang / sa'i byin gyi rlabs thos pa dang / sal yang dag par gnas pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mthong bar dga' zhing skob
238a2: ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar shin tu yangs pa'i sems mngon par zhen pa/ thams cad las gyen tu 'phags pa dang / zhing gi 'du shes shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems
238a3: chos thams cad las sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul yongs su gnon pa
238a4: dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems snying po byang chub kyi rgyan lhag mthong gis yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / shin tu yangs pa'i sems
238a5: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / shin tu che ba'i sems sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshad med pa'i sems
238a6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas mi zad cing mthar thug pa myed pa'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs
238a7: dang mi bsnyengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pas/ snying po byang chub la rdo rje dam pa'i snying po can de la pad mo'i stan rin po che thams cad kyi lhun can zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng
238a8: ge'i khril mngon par bltas te 'dug go/ de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par gnas pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rlan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin
238b1: drabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i dang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bskal pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dang 'gran tu babang pa mthong bar 'gyur bar sngon gyi las bcu byung // bcug shen 'das sa/ sas
238b2: thams cad da bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi zhing pa byang chub gyi gyu rnam par dag pas rnam par ga par gyu / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bya/ ya ba dang / ngan po dang / ngan ga pasamathams cad dam pa
238b3: bas rnam par dag par gyur te/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad padapa'i tshal gyi rkyen stangasangs rgyas kyi rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi nang thams ca sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sa
238b4: dga' zhi sem par byed pas/ rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po cha thams cad kyi nga bzhin dkun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad sems can gyi khams
238b5: kun mtshan dang dpe byed bzang pos rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan dang lha ba lhub kyi sprin gyis kun tu 'bas par kun tu khebs par kun nas rnam par dag
238b6: par gyur to/ / sang sa rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad pan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang ldan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
238b7: steng po byang chub kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sebs can thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran par yid la bya ba la brtson bar kun nas gnas pas rnam
238b8: pa dag par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar gyur to// sngon gyi lhas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pa kun tu bzang
239a1: mthong bar 'gyur ba'i ldan gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltas/ 'ag 'ams thas da dus gan du pra ba rnangs las rdul shin grang zhing yang nga bzhin gshegs pa thams na dag
239a2: drab mang po rnam par snang bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu pra ba re re las kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'thon te// kha dog gcig pa dang 'dog sna tshogs dang /
239a3: kha dog brgya stong du mar ches kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi sprin de bzhin gshegs
239a4: pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed pa mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu pra ba re ra
239a5: las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'khor lo dang dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
239a6: rnamam sa/ na thab d+hA dang / da tha bapa dang thug pa dang / ga sbyin ma dpa than te/ byung nabs pas dang na yang pa yan tan sa rgyam tsha sbyin thams
239a7: sgra rab tu sgro gcig/ phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re ra las kyang nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i
239a8: sprin mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gyed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shinaH
239b1: pra ba re re las kyang lus thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'i mar me'i sprin mang po 'thon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer ltar rab tu snang bar byed cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
239b2: thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nor bu rin po che'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur snang ba'i sprin mang po 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas
239b3: par 'gengs par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra be re re las kyang 'od gzer gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbyibs su snang ba'i sprin mang po 'thon te/
239b4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang smon lam gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul
239b5: shin tu phra ba re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi kha dog du sdang ba'i sprin rgya mtsho sems can thams cad gdon pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam
239b6: pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgrub pa mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po dang ga byung bar gyur to// de nas
239b7: tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs kyis sngon gyi lhas su snang ba bcu po de dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i skabs ni bye/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas ni brtan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis na
239b8: bzlas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyims kyi snang ba ni yang dag par skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa la ni ma na du zlar/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pa'i sman lam sa byin gyis ni byin du babs/
240a1: nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyad yul lan ma ngan par mas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad bral brlabs pa cal shin tu nges pa'i stobs dang / shugs ni rab tu thar/ byang chub sams dpa' bran du bcar tha
240a2: na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang 'dra bar ni sems/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la dbang po ni mngon dbyar/ byang chub sems dpa' bran du bzang po mthong bar byab la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen
240a3: poni thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ni ldan/ phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / kun tra ltabs yul yongs su gnon par
240a4: byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'dug pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs par bya ba la yang dag par btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa yongs su btsal ba dang /
240a5: mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig byang
240a6: rab sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam la zhugs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rdo rje thogs pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rjes su 'brang bar
240a7: smon pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyis bslabs pa dang / yongs su gnon pa'i rtsal rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i mnyam par nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub
240a8: sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul yang dag par gnas pa dang ni ldan pa des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
240b1: dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa/ rus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i yul la dang ldan pa/ mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul can/ mu med pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa/
240b2: thams cad kyis rnam par lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ mngon par 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pad/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
240b3: rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngan byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil rgya mtshon ni 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun ni byas shing / sa ge'
240b4: bri rin pa che'i pad mtshan po'i snying pa can zhag la 'dug pa mthong ste/ des de'i bsdu'i bag thams cad las bsla sbar re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od ga zer
240b5: gyi sprin mang po 'thon nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtug pa/ thams cad rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo //
240b6: des de'i lus las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs rgya
240b7: chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa mthong ngo / / spyi bo dang phrag pa'i spun gnyis las bsdu sgo thams cad nas kyang spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin
240b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo / / pa spu'i brag thams cad las baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi shing thams
241a1: cang kyi rdul gan tu za ba sa ma pa mngan par zan nas/ da bzhan gshegs pa thams cad 'bang ca la mang byas pa gagasas/ mngan par babapas nga// bcu thathams cad las bsngas
241a2: nas kyang klas sngachags kyi ga gastan ma pa sangs rgyas kyig thams pa da rdus rdzum bsnyed mngon par na nas/ rnam kya byings rnams pa'i byangs kyis thas klas pa thams pa rgyas par sha nas
241a3: rnas kyi nga gtsun gyi rgyan kyis brgyan par byas te/ srang dang phyim dang bdag pa'i mad padam shes pa'i char rab tu 'bye cing / de bzhin gagags pa thams cad kyi 'bang ci kyil 'bar byas par bag sa/ 5na
241a4: par 'bab par byed pa mthar/ / bsku'i sgra thams cad las bcu'i ska re re nas kya dgas sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thun/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi saHsa klas pa thams cad kun
241a5: nas yog par byas nas brgyan par mthong / / baspu'i brag thams cad nas spu'i sgo re re nas dang sna chags kyi lnga lnga'i sprin dang / phreng ba snga tshogs kyi sprin dang / mra tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin pa
241a6: yid bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo //
241a7: baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i phyir rin po che'i shing gi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed mngon
241a8: par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ rin po che'i shing las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'gro ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
241b1: thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu ran pa che'i char chen pa mngon par bab par byed pa mthong ngo / / baspu'i sgo brag thams cad las baspu'i sgra re re nas kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris kyi sprin sangs rgyas
241b2: kyid thams cad kyi rdul shin tu zab snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi shing thams cad rgyas par 'dengs pa mthong ngo // baspu'i brag thams cad las
241b3: bcu' slar nas kyang tshangs pa'i drung rugartags pa'i tha ris thams cad du stsal pa'i sbyin ma pa mngan par 'than te/ mngangon par sa sa rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la rnamatha' ba la ga
241b4: gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo / / ba spu'i bug thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
241b5: thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po yang dag par 'dzin par mthong ngo / / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sprin dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sangs
241b6: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa/ thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gnas
241b7: med pa/ skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang rten du gyur par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bug thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/
241b8: sangs rgyas byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas
242a1: bathams cad rgyas pa ga / / sems can mos parlabs pa chernams yongs su dag par sgrub pa mthang // bak+Sha brag thams cad las bkrAs Sh+ka nas kyang sems kyi gang cig la sangs rgyas can na
242a2: da5/ kun nas nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas kyig thams cad ma rdul gan tra zab snyed kyi sbyin mang po mengon par 'thun nas/ sa kyi bying sa namamapa'i dbyings kyim thamaklas pa thams cad byas par gas/ kun
242a3: yongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par grub pa mthong ngo / / bcu'i brag ri ba cu'i sgo thams cad las sems kyi gang cig ra la sangs rgyas kyi shing kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pas sargyas kyigang thams cad ma na
242a4: za ba snyed kyi sbyin mad pa mngon par bathon nas/ chos kyi byings nam mapa'i byings kyis klas pa/ thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo //
242a5: khrag thams cad las baspu'i skor re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sbyin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu tha ba snyad mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi khams rnam mapa'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cadas
242a6: par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed cing / tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // bad+ma'i brag thams cad
242a7: las pa spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa
242a8: thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mang po rjod par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang
242b1: byang chub sems dpa'i sras kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sangs rgyas kyi gang 'byam thas
242b2: pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa nye bar sgrub pa mthong ngo / / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgore ra
242b3: nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i
242b4: phyir byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par rjod pa mthong ngo / / ba spu'i bug thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don dbyang chub
242b5: s ems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sprin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'thon nas
242b6: mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo / / des de'i ba spu'i bug thams cad nas ba spu'i sgo thams cad las baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgyab
242b7: ston pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul gan tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon
242b8: gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phral gyi yul de lta bu mthong nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bas kyang shas cher byang chub sems dpa'
243a1: kun tu bzang po'i lus la sems sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i yan lag re re dang / yan lag rnam par bye ba re re dang / lus kyi cha re re dang / lus kyi cha rnam par bye ba re re dang /
243a2: yan lag gi phyogs re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs rnam par phye bar re dang / lus re re dang / lus rnam par bye ba re re dang / ba d+ma'i bug re rare dang / ba spu'i brag rnam par bye ba re re nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
243a3: khams 'di rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ chu'i phung po dang bcas sa'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas gling dang bcas/ nAkA dang bcas/ rin po tsho'i ri dang bcas/ ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang
243a4: bcas/ grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang / khams dang rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas/ nags tshal dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang
243a5: bcas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang bcas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang bcas/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang bcas/ klu'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten dang bcas/ mi'i 'jig rten dang bcas/
243a6: lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas
243a7: byibs dang bcas/ sprin dang bcas/ klog dang bcas/ skar ma dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ zla ba phyed dang bcas/ zla ba gcig dang bcas/ rus dang bcas/ lo dang bcas/ bskal pa bar ma dang bcas/ bskal pa dang
243a8: bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang
243b1: nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar gA'i phyogs mthams dang / lhonab kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gaphyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / ga phyogs thams cad kyi 'jigs
243b2: gi khams thams cad kyang sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi
243b3: mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mi chen po'i mtshan re re las sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub
243b4: sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas/ sems dang bcas/ kha khyim dang bcas/ nyin zhig dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du byi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sangs
243b5: rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas par thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mthong bar
243b6: gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
243b7: po'i lus dang / mi chen po'i mtshan rer dang ba s+tha'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par bye ba dang / ban tshun ma 'dres par mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gag
243b8: p a rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du shar phyogs na'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
244a1: bkun tu bzang po'i dbang gi 'jig rten gyi 'ams pad mo'i dpa yini rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston cing 'drag par mang / shar phyogs na jis bde bzhin dbyugs da phyogs bcams kun tu 'jig rten na 'ams thams cad byed
244a2: gshegs pa thams cad kye nabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo / / ji ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams
244a3: t hams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
244a4: t hams cad kyi rdul shin tu pra ba dag la rdul shin tu phra ba re ri'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar bya che ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na song ge'i khri rin
244a5: po che'i pad mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo / / de'i lus re re las kyang dus gsum du byung ba'i dmigs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon par bstan
244a6: pa mthong ngo / / zhing thams cad dang sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon tu bstan pa
244a7: mthong ngo / / sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang gdams ngag yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
244a8: yang dag par bsdu ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa dag kyang thos par gyur to// des de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par rtse ba de lta bu dag mthong ste/ thos nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu
244b1: byin pa la rnam par spyod pa bcu thob par gyur to/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur
244b2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'grob la tha me dad pa'i ye shes kyi pa ral tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma chod cing rimathong bya ba'i yeshes kyi par ma tu bye
244b3: pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su zhugs pa rab tu blang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa sngo
244b4: par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges par rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i ye shre
244b5: kye pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa zad mi shes pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes kyi pha
244b6: rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ / chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi
244b7: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ / sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// skad cig gcig
244b8: la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod par thob par gyur to/ / de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang
245a1: 2/ / ldan pa'i tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste bzhag par gyur to// de ltar tsheng dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sa
245a2: pos lag pa bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
245a3: snyad sngan chad ma mthong ba dag la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ / de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang tshogs su gyur to// de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
245a4: rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu byung bar gyur to/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gnas par bya ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shing tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur to// smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi
245a5: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byung ba'i lam sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs
245a6: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis shugs drag po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// sangs rgyas
245a7: thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
245a8: pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis spyi bor bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems
245b1: dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ / de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khrims kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su
245b2: chung pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ /
245b3: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i g.yas pas reg ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chos kyi sgomang po la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin du kun tu bzang
245b4: po'i lus thams cad las 'phros pa'i lag pa'i sprin mang pos reg pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang chos kyi sgo mang po la tshul sna tshogs kyis zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
245b5: bzang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ni mthong na de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni de bzhin
245b6: gshegs pas mkhyen na mkhyen grang ngo / / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mngon par 'dod cing bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu
245b7: rnam par spyad de/ bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu bsnyen bkur
245b8: to/ / bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams yongs su sdud pa byed cing mchod sbyin chen po btang ba thams cad dang sbyar ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par grags pa/ sems can thams
246a1: bdapa 'dabs pa dag pa sa dkun du byas so/ / dazhal pa can pa dag ral yang thams cad mkhyen pa cad bams la ma napar smon cang btang ba dang / ga ba can pa dang / shin du gtang bsangs rgyas kyi zhing badz+ra
246a2: med pa'i rdul brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byas so/ / bskal pa chen po de dag la re re la yang lus dang srog pangs par bya ba med par sangs rgyas kyi chos gces par bya bas lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du seM
246a3: bzhig yongs su btang ngo / / rgyal po'i srid chen po yongs su btang ngo // grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang // khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // sdug cing yid du 'ong la btang mi za ba'i 'khor
246a4: tshogs dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / / bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // rang gi lus dang / sha dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // bdag gi lus dag las kyang khrag dag kyang slong ba rnams la yongs su btang ngo // rus
246a5: pa dang / rkang dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // rkang pa dang / lag pa dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // yan lag dang nying lag dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // sna dang rna ba dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // mig dag kyang yongs su btang ngo // rang gi kha
246a6: nas lce'i dbang po dag kyang yongs su btang ngo / / bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / bla na med par gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbul mngon par smon cing / rang gi mgo
246a7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed cig yongs su btang ngo / / bskal ba chen po re re 'drig ba bzhin du bskal ba chen po rgyamatsha sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
246a8: pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las/ bskal pa rgya mtsho re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul du shin tu pra ba snyad cig la dbang po dam par gyur to// rim gror byas so//
246b1: 'azu cir byas so// bu dra byas so// bachod pa byas so// na bza' dang / bgos dang / gzims ca dang / spun gyi rkyen can dang / yo byed dag kyang dbul ba byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la yang du
246b2: tu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gdams ngag thams cad la yang rab tu zhugs so// de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bzung ste/ rigs kyi bu de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sems bskyed pa
246b3: 'ga' tsam gyis kyang mi 'thun pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran no/ / de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems sam/ bdag
246b4: yongs su bskyad pa'i yongs su gzung ba'i sems sam/ bdag dang gzhan du bye ba'i sems sam/ byang chub kyi lam dang bral bar bya ba'i sems sam/ 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba'i sems sam/ zhum pa'i
246b5: sems sam/ sgrib pas mgo rmongs pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran te/ gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems ye shes gzhan gyis mi thub cing rgyal bar dka' ba'i snying po dang ldan
246b6: pabaskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste nga'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas pa'i sbyor ba dang / ngas snying rje chen po'i sems rab tu thob ste/ sems can yongs su bskyab pa
246b7: dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang bar byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don tu bla ma la rim gror byas pa'i sbyor ba dag
246b8: dang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i don tu lus yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i don tu rang gi srog yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba de dag ni bstan par byan bsal pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang
247a1: da bang 'thu ga/ gas kyi rung banam ma mam gad cigalas kyang tshig dang yig 'a tsam yang sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud ngas par shes par byab la brtson pa dang /
247a2: rol kyis chos mngon du thos par bya ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i yeshes snang ba thams cad rab du brjod pa la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lags thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang / sems ca na thams
247a3: dkyi'akhor ba'i bde ba yongs srab skyed pal brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pal brtson pas 'khor los sbyang ba'i rgyas srid yongs su btang bas mnyos pa'am/ mdag patha
247a4: bad yongs su gtang bas mnyos pa gang yang med de/ de ltar nga nyid kyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan par byas na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par
247a5: 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas rnam pa de lta bu'i tshogs kyi stobs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu ba stsags pa'i stobs dang / mos pargya chen po'i stobs dang / yon tan lanan tan du bya ba'i stobs dang / chos thams cad
247a6: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi mig gi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs dang /
247a7: shin tu sbyangs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i stobs kyis chos kyi lus yongs su dag pa dus gsum du tha mi dad pa thob par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gzugs kyi lus
247a8: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu gzhol ba/ thams cad du rab tu
247b1: gnas pa rnam par 'phrul pathams cad rnam pa thams cad du san pa'ab ba thams cad kyi du 'a ba yang sangs su snyams/ / rigs kyi bungs lus thob pa phran su mtshogs pa/ bzhal pa rgya mtshom pa lams pa
247b2: yongs su thub pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong mang bas 'byung bar dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba 'di la ltos// rigs kyi bung na dge ba'i rtsab ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnalam du yang mi 'o na/ mthong ba
247b3: cigag smos/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga'i ming thos patsam gyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod do// mthong ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam dang / bskul pa tsam dang rjes
247b4: su 'brang ba tsam dang / rmi lam du mthong ba tsam dang / rmi lam du ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod de/ sems can la las ni nga nyin zhag gcig tu
247b5: dran pa byas na yongs su sman par 'gyur ro/ / la las ni zhag bdun dang / la las ni zla ba byed dang / la las ni zla ba gcig dang / la las ni lo gcig dang / la las ni lo brgya dang / la las ni bskal pa gcig dang
247b6: la las ni bskal pa brgyan sa/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i snyed du rjes su dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// la las ni tshe gcig tu rjes su
247b7: dran par byas na yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / la las ni tshe'i rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la las ni nga'i 'od
247b8: mthong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / la las ni 'od gzer bkye ba mthong bas/ la las ni zhing bskyod pas/ la las ni gzugs kyi lus bstan pas/ la la dga' bar byas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur te/
248a1: rigs kyi bu de ltar thabs kyi tshul sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi busems can gang gis de'i sangs
248a2: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thos pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye'o/ / gang gis nga'i lus yongs su dag pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag ni nga'i lus lta bur skye bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu nga'i lus rnam
248a3: bar dag pa 'di la ltos shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la bsams pa dang / ba spu'i re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
248a4: med pa'i sangs rgyas skye bas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / / zhing rgya mtsho ngan de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mchos kun nas bskor ba mang pos bzhugs par mthong ngo // zhing rgya mtsho de dag
248a5: thams cad kyang gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / khor yug sa tshogs dang / sprin sna tshogs dang nam mkha' sna tshogs kyis kun nas khebs pa dang / sangs/
248a6: rgyas 'thung ba na tshogs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sa tshogs kyi dathebs dang ldan par mthong ngo // pa sri'i bu ga ngar 'a dzes pa bzhin du ba cu'i bug ma lus pa thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / deb byang par
248a7: po thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad la yang de bzhin te/ zhing rgya mtshor re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba steng byed nas/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten/
248a8: gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag dang /
248b1: rnaMs su bstan pasangs su bsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi khongs su gtegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grags te/ sems can yongs su ldan par byed par gyu to// des
248b2: da dan gyi zun mas kyi sadag pa bshes gtan sangs rgyas kyi ning ga rdul shin tu bsnyed cig ga zung du yin te/ mamed pa dang bsnyen bzang bas mi shes kyi snang ba dang / de dge pa'i rtsal bsngags pa de dag gis kyang chu
248b3: sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ste/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags par gyur ba de'i brgya'i chang yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang ma yin/ brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ bye ba brgya song gi chang yang ma yin te/
248b4: grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang dper bya ba dang / rgyur bya ba dang du yang mi thod do// des dang po sems bskyed pa nye bar bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ba'i bar der sangs cas
248b5: kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ ji snyed cig la zhugs par gyur pa de dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyi bar byang chub sems dpa'
248b6: kun tu bzang po'i ba spu'i bu ga re res sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mang po la sems kyi skad cig gcig gis zhugs par gyur te/ / ba spu'i bu ga re rer ji lta ba de bzhin du
248b7: p a spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad la yang sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du me pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba bsnyed rnam par gnon pa phyi ma'i mtha'
248b8: mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pas zhugs kyang // zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mthar phyin par ma gyur te/
249a1: zhing rgya mtsho'i lhun dang / zhing rgya mtsha'i bye brag dang / zhing rgya mtsha yangs su bsdu ba dang / zhing rgya mtsho yongs su 'grub pa dang / sheng rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / shing rgya mtshon pa
249a2: bar phye ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mchog cig nas cig du brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i sra dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho bye brag dang / sangs rgyas byu ba rgya mtsha yongs su bsrung pa dang /
249a3: sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su 'jig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
249a4: mchog cig nas gcig tu brgyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
249a5: dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / sems can gyi khams
249a6: la 'jug pa dang / skad cig re res sems can gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / byang chub sems
249a7: dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i rnam par gnon pa rgya mtsho'i mthar byin par mgyur te/ de la zhing la lar ni bskal par rnam par spyod par
249a8: sbyar to/ zhing la la ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du spyad par gyur te/ zhi de gnas kyang g.yos pa med do// sems kyi skad cig la yang shing rgya mtshomatha' dang
249b1: dbus ma dpa la 'jug cang sems can rnams kyang than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par gyur / des de ltar mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa dang
249b2: smon las rgya mtshamanyam pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang pa mnam pa nyid dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par rgya
249b3: pa dbang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pas rgyas par dgang pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi 'khar la bskong ba mnyam pa 'id dang / mas yang da/
249b4: par rig pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs rjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas
249b5: kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su thob
249b6: par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bskal pa dang / bskal pa 'jam sbas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med//
249b7: pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gnan te/ mngon par brjod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad dbyangs kyis smon lam btab pa// / ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/
249b8: dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi po// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad
250a1: med kyis mnasasaH/ / gang ga tus sbyin sa rab brgyad pa sas// rgyal ba gan la rab sa kyag 'am a// rdul gcig stang dus spyad sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras
250a2: dbus na bzhugs pad/ / de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par// thams cad rgyal bdag gis gang bar mos// de dag bsngags pa kyi zad rgya mtshornams// dbyangs kyi yan lag tu mtshos can
250a3: rgyal btsun gyi yon tan ba brjod cing / / bde ba gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod// matog das pazung ba dam pa dang // sas stanarnams dang thug sa gdugs mcho dang // sang ma mtsha
250a4: bdug pa dam pa yis/ / rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na 'tha' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // bye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang // khyad par can gyi rgyan mchog thams cad kyis// rgyal bded
250a5: la ni mchod par bgyi/ / mchod pa gang dag bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dang pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags
250a6: zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang
250a7: sangs rgyas sras/ / rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang // 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag
250a8: byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/ / mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo blan med pa bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'da' bston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing
250b1: ba myong/ bskal pa zhing ga rdul spyad bzhugs par yang // bdag gis thal mo rab sbyang gas la bar brtse// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yid dang bsgral zhing gsol ba ye/
250b2: dge ba chung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcwa yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par 'gyur/
250b3: gang yang mabyon de dag ba myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas skyon// phyogs bcu gang 'i 'azhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung
250b4: gshegs rgyal ba dang / / sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams
250b5: ni/ 'thun par gyur cig ba'ang grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni gdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye badran par 'gyur// tshe rabs kun tu shi 'phos skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar sho/
250b6: rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par// rtag tu mnyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha'i skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin
250b7: skad/ gral bum skad dang me'i skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// des shing pha rol gyi na lang brtson te// byang chub sems ni nam
250b8: kyang rjed mi 'gyur/ / sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par 'gyur ba dag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang /
251a1: de ltar pad mo chus myi chags pa bzhin// nyi bla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams jitsam par// ngan song sdug sngal rab tuzhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba
251a2: kun 'god cing / / 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sems can dge spyod dang 'thun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs skal pa kun tu
251a3: spyod par 'gyur/ / bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad bdag la phan par
251a4: 'dod pa'i grogs pa dag/ bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis rnams nam yang yid mi dbyung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/
251a5: mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/
251a6: bzang po spyod pa rnam par byang ba yang ma 'ongs skal pa kun tu spyod par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na// bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab tid 'dzin rnamathar dang /
251a7: yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul cig stad na rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyod pa spyad cing baH
251a8: bar bgyi/ / de dag ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang // sra tsa mtshon la dus gsumachod rnyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gad rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung cen yan lan
251b1: mtsho'i spre skad kyis/ / rgyal bkun dbyangs yan lag na ma dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa de bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pargyal ba tha
251b2: dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gis yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la// zlab stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang // ska cig
251b3: gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ / gang yang bskal pa dus gsum chad dag/ skad cag cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge dag/ de dag skad cig gtsig gis bad
251b4: gis blta/ / rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing gargyan// de dag rdul cig stang du mngon par bsgrub// da ltar ma lus phyogs
251b5: rnams thams cad du/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing girgyan la 'drag/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten skyon ma rnams// dedag rim par sangs rgyas 'khor lo sor// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ni mtha' skrod// mgon po can gyi drung
251b6: dra bdag mchi'o/ / kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgo'i theg pa'i stobs dag dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dag pa'i
251b7: bsod nams stobs rnams dang / / chags pa med par 'gyur ba'i ye shes stobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stabs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed// las kyi skabs rnams yongs
251b8: su dag zed cing / / nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs me da ba byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing /
252a1: sems can kya ma rnam par la// chos rnams rnam nga nga // pags kya rab tu rtags par byeng // snod brgyam rnam par dag /
252a2: smon lam rgya mtshor ba tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ba tu mchod byed cing // bskal ba rgya mtshor ma sgro spyad par bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs brgyal ba yi// byang chub spyod pa'i smon
252a3: bye brag rnams/ / bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// dekun bdag gis ma sus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thub pa/ gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs /
252a4: spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing // spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang // bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar// de 'drar ba dag kyang de dang /
252a5: mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyod pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyis ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de'i bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshad yod mthung
252a6: cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi// nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de
252a7: bzhin te/ / tsatsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu la zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// mi dang lnga'i bde
252a8: ba'i mchog rnams kyang / / zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog
252b1: du 'di 'gyur ro/ / gang gis bzang spod sngon lam 'di btab pa// des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong // de dag rnyed parab rnyed bdabang
252b2: 'tsho/ / mtsho 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ong // kun du bzang po de yang ji 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams myed lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa
252b3: dag/ de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thu
252b4: 'jig rten gsum po kun na 'ang mchod par 'gyur/ / byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa
252b5: thams cad btul/ / gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni klog gam bston pa yi// de'i rnam par sbyin pas sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyid ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal rje
252b6: ltar mkhyen cing dpa' bo dang / / kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo
252b7: ba gang la mchog tu sngags pa des/ / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bstsal te// mngon sum
252b8: snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/ / bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro// der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang // 'jig rten
253a1: ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ / rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad mo dam pa shin du mdzes las skyes// snang ba mtha' yas rgyal ba'i mngon
253a2: sum du/ / lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnam su yang / sems
253a3: rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/ / gang gis bzang po spyod pa ston pa yis// dge ba chung zad bdag gis ci bsag pa// des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor
253a4: par shog/ gang yang bzang po spyod pa bsngos pa yis// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab 'gro bar shog/
253a5: shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang nas// sdong pos brgyan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs chen po las/
253a6: bzangs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i spyod pa phyogs gcig te ci snyed pa rdzogs s+ho//
1b1: sa/ nas bya kur nga
1b2: b u nor bzangs mtshan mos lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha pa kun
1b3: tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba
1b4: dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / shes par bya ba dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang / rgyas par dgang ba dang
1b5: sa su shes par bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang / bsgom pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes
1b6: gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo'i lha ma
1b7: rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par sdang bas/ 'gro kar gtams pa rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba
1b8: sa su sams pa' dbang po dkyil 'khor dpa dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bathob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa/ phyogs kun bya bya da kyi
2a1: mngon par ltas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ga/ nga rgyal thams can dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bsgrub par zhe non pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
2a2: dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi phyed pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshos gnyen la brten pa/ yongs su 'phel bar bya
2a3: ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen pos brgya mtsho yongs su skyes pa/ bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo
2a4: sems can kun tu sbyor ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo / / de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten
2a5: thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gimathu byung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te/ mdzod spu nas 'od gzer
2a6: ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa bkye'o/ / nges 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
2a7: bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dus te lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to/ / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'od gzer de reg par gyur ma thag tu/ de nyid kyi mod la ting ngange 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
2a8: 'khor thob par gyur to/ / de thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun nas skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam na sa'i
2b1: dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rdo rje'i rdul shin tu bya ba 'am/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang
2b2: me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad la rdul phra mo re re
2b3: zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas// rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams
2b4: dang bcas/ bzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ sa'i gzhi rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can/ chu klung dang mtsho sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rgya mtsho sna
2b5: tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/ lha rdzas kyi khyim sna tshogs kyi rkyen dang ldan pa shing sde tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyan sde tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ klu'i grong
2b6: khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ nam mkha' lding gi
2b7: zong khyer gyi khyim kyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer gyi byis kyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lto'i phye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi d+han dang bcas pa/ phyogs dang phyogs
2b8: mtshams thams cad na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi gnas dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang / gshin rje'i
3a1: rten gyi ma nga/ ma mam yin kya ma kyi cig po ba dang / skye ba'i mus dang sbas pa/ ba snga gas kyis ma sa pa rgyu mapa mas pa kyi brag sa yongs sum no pa rnamapa
3a2: ga par gyur ba mthong / / 'jig rten pa khams dngag kyang rnam pa natshogs su mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams la yid kun nas nyon mongs par mthong // malan yongs su dag par mthong ngo // lal ni gas
3a3: kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo / / la la ni lam gyi rgyud yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // lal
3a4: ni gan tu yongs su dag par mthong ngo / / lalan gnamanyam par mthong ngo // la la ni spyi 'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo // la la ni sbrul bzhir 'dug par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can las kyi rgyu dang /
3a5: sems can gyi skye gnas thams cad na mtshan mo'i lha po sems can kun du sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal sems can so so nas 'dul ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sems
3a6: can thams cad la mngon du gyur par gnas par mthong ngo / / sems can ci'i tshad rnam pa dzilta bu dang ldan pa dang / mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang / lus rnam pa sna tshogs can dang / lus rnam pa ji lta bang
3a7: ldan pa dang / dig rnam par bye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / dbang gi rnam pa dzi lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang /
3a8: gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad las 'dres par mngon sum du gnas par mthong ngo // de yang 'di lta// sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i
3b1: sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam
3b2: gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa la stsogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang /
3b3: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyung du gtogs pa'i sems
3b4: can rnams kyi mtshan mo'i mun pa mun dag gis chod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / ma snyen pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mngon
3b5: par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa'i ma yin pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor gyi 'jigs par ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor tu bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par
3b6: bzlog pa dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs pa rnam par zlog
3b7: pa dang / 'chi ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor du 'tshe ba med pa'i bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge
3b8: ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po
4a1: d ang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi sngag to'i grags po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dgas shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge
4a2: ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ljang gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par
4a3: bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can skal pa mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis
4a4: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sems can bskal pa mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dus mi zad par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi dus mi zad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog
4a5: pa dang / rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam
4a6: par bzlog pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching bas 'jigs
4a7: shing sdang bas rnams kyi 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la so mor mngon tu gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste sgo nga las skyes pa'i sems
4a8: can dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes
4b1: med pa yang ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongasas skyob pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang / rnam par gnon pa shin tu yangs pa'i stobs dang / byang
4b2: chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho'i shugs drag po shin tu
4b3: skyes pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrub pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems
4b4: can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang ldan pas/ zhing thams cad yongs su dag
4b5: par bya ba la mngon tu gyur par gnas par mthong ngo / / chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon tu gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
4b6: cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /
4b7: sems can thams cad kyi sems la sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa
4b8: rgya mtsho rnam par spyad pal mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bstsal ba la mngon du gyur cing
5a1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i don du gnas pa mthong ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'
5a2: rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bur mthong nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/
5a3: spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho rab tu thob nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas dor gyen du bltas so// de nas mtshan mo'i lha
5a4: mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / mtshan rnam par dag pa de ma snang bar byas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo gzugs su byas so// rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rgya
5a5: cing 'dug par gnas so/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
5a6: khyod kyi sku yangs mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pa bdag gis mthong // nam mkha' skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin/ de byad bzang pos rnam par byas pa mthong // 'od kyi 'khor can su
5a7: bzang dam pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang po snyed// kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du/ phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang // 'od gzer dra ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam/
5a8: khyod kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'gyed ma mdzad// 'od gzer sgrol pad mo yid 'ong gnas// khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// spos kyi na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed// 'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdas/
5b1: tharnams ca pa pas padad pas// a dbyas 'thugs pa'i rgyal khyag/ byang thag pa'i ldan padas 'gas pa na// gag nga 'drar bar raba'ang// ngad da/ kha can thag sa
5b2: gti nagasan pa rnam par brdzog pa mdzad/ / khyod kyi dri me pal mdog bzang ba las// dbun sbyin dang nyis yangs pa'abyung / khyod kyinyis dkyil 'khor 'du 'o bzang // rnam par snang mdzad stod yul ya
5b3: 'byin/ / khyod kyi spyan nas bla slar 'od 'byung ba// rtag tu dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste// de dag phyogs bcung ba gang zhing 'gro ba rnams// rab tu sdang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel// khyed kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus
5b4: mnyam pa'i/ / sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'gro// de dag chos dbyings yangs par rgyas 'gengs shing // sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul// khyod kyi smani 'byam zas phyogs su swA /
5b5: 'gro ba kun la mngon 'byung dga' ba skyed// rgyal po mye dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i// 'jigs pa thams cad rnamase la zhi bar mdzad// gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas// yon tan rnam par sems
5b6: shing nyer phyin pa/ / de'i tshe 'od gzor dri med 'khor bzang ba// khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams gseb nas 'thon// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mar snang mdzad nas// 'jig rten snang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de
5b7: rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnam bstadan nas/ / de tshe bdag gi lus kyi gseb tra zhi// gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag dag pa// de tshe bde ba mad byung yangs pa myong // gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su non
5b8: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dpag yas mthong bar 'gyur/ / gom pa rnam por gyen du bteg pa la'ang // rdul phran grangs snyed tshul ni bdag gis reg/ rdul phran shan tu phra ba gcig la yang // zhing gi rdul
6a1: snyed zhing rnams mthong bar gyur/ / rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa tha gu ste// zheng mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs// de'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong // tshe nger ngu zhing smre sngags yongs
6a2: su 'don/ / zhing mngal la kun nas nyon mongs dag/ de na sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chung // rgyal ba thugs rje can yang der skyes ste// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin no// 'ang tshul le la yongs pa/
6a3: tshon mongs ste// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzangs mang pos brgyan// skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta sdug/ skyon mang rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun ma 'chad// 'ang rnams rgya mtsho langs shing dri med pa/
6a4: rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan// de dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi tshe// rnam par snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongs su mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na rgyal ba dag/ shing dbang dam pa'i drung
6a5: dugashegs pastan/ / rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la// khyod kyang kun tu rjes su zhugs par mthong /
