99b3: la rnam par rol pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsgom pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// 'ad ni sangs rgyas thams cad
99b4: yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcarnams te// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar
99b5: 'gyur ba'o/ / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o// yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o// rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o// yongs su grub par byed pa'o// zhing ma lus pa thams cad khong
99b6: du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyan gcig gi lhab ltab la rgyan dang / lhab ltab gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs byin gyis rlob pa'o// sems can gyi khams gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur
99b7: thug par byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyun 'chad pa med par byed pa'o/ / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / shin tu bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa sna tshogs dum rnam pa tha dad pad
99b8: chos mtha' yas pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i rgyun mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings
100a1: kyis mtha' gtugs pa yongs su ston pa'o/ / sems can tshad med pa spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas yongs su 'dus pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo
100a2: skor ba yongs su ston pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / mi 'bral bar byin gyis rlob pa'o// chos thams cad kyi sprin dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du med pas rnam
100a3: par dag pa dmigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung ba rnam par dmigs par byed pa'o/ / tshad med par rnam par spyad pa la bsgribs pa med par rtogs pas khong du chud pa'i rnams chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan thams cad dang
100a4: ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang / mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams yongs su ston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i rnams 'jig rten
100a5: thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i don du chos kyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu ston pa'o/ / de lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
100a6: dpa'i chos don 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// lhag pa'i bsam pa dri med rnyog
100a7: pa med pa yis/ / gang rnams rgyal ba blta bas nam yang mi rims shing // rgyal ba kun gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i rgyan sprin la// smon pa'i mkhas pa de dag skye ba'i thog ma gnas// dus gsum 'byung ba'i 'jig rten
100a8: ma lus kun bkang ste/ / zhing dang sems can de bzhin chos dang sangs rgyas rnams// sems can dgrol phyir smon lam 'debs pas brgyan pa'i sems// de ni bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyi skye ba gnyis//
100b1: gang rnams chos kyi sprin 'thung nam yang ma ngoms shing // nges par rtogs pa'i yid kyis dus gsum chags med lus// mkha' dbyangs dri med mnyam med rnams kyi lus ldan pa// mtshungs pa med pa den
100b2: de dag skab gsum/ / lhag pa'i bsam par rab rdo rje mtshungs brtan pas// thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mchor rnam par 'jug byed cing // gang rnams snying rje chen po'i gang chen mtshor 'jug pa// den
100b3: skyes bu khrumachog rnams kyi skye ba bzhi/ / gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing // pha rol byin pa dri med rgyamatsho mngon bsgrubs te// chos kyi 'ong 'gyed 'gro ba yongs su smin byed pa/
100b4: de ni skyes bu chen po de dag skye ba lnga// chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chags med sems// dus gsum dpe' bla med pa'i sangs rgyas rigs byu shing // gang rnams chos dbyings rgya mtsho tshul la 'jug byad ga//
100b5: 'di na mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug/ gang rnams chos lus yongs dag chags pa med pa'i sems// zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyis dbang byas shing // sangs rgyas stobs rnams ma lus khong du chud rtogs pa/
100b6: de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi skyeb bsam yas bdun// gang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la dbang ldan zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par dpyod byed la// ting 'dzin kun tshul gang chen tshol yongs 'jug pa//
100b7: de ni de bzhin nyid rten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad// gang rnams zhing kun 'byam klas yongs su sbyong byed cing // sems can thams cad yongs su smin byed 'dul la rab brtson la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnams rnam
100b8: ston pa/ / de ni grags pa chen po rnams kyi skye ba dgu// gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhin bzhugs te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs drag yangs pa rnam spel cing / gang rnams chos dbyings ga ni
101a1: tshul tha dad chags med pa/ / de ni rgyal sras rnams kyi skye ba bcu yin no// rigs kyi bu skye ba bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye'o// de ltar na 'jig
101a2: rten thams cad la snang ba byed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phral ba yongs su ston pa'o//
101a3: smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa rigs kyi bu
101a4: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su lta zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa ste/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin du yangs pa
101a5: la 'jug ci'i khong du chud pa ste/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba khong du chud par byed cing / gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling pa de'i lum 'i
101a6: ni'i nags tshal du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yongs su blta ba'i don du sngon gyi smon lam gyis skyes te/ de ltar kho mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjes su dran pa bsgos zhing rnam par spyod do//
101a7: de ltar kho mo 'di ni gnas te/ de pan char la brgyan bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi po brang nas 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba tshe/ lum bi ni nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi las bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/
101a8: 'di ltar lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad mthon dman med la/ dam grog dang g.yangs med cing mnyam par gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dang po byung ba'o// yang lum ba ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad
101b1: gseg ma dang / gyo mo med la/ steng du ma dang char ma dang bral ste/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur nas/ rin po che mang pos yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi lhas gnyis pa byung ba'o//
101b2: yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang su dang / ta la'i phreng bas rnam par 'khrigs pas yongs su brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas gsum pa byung ba'o//
101b3: yang lum bi na'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i spos kyi mU ku kun nas 'thon pa dang / bye ma thams cad kyi mdzod kun nas 'thon pa dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi sprin dang nabran yongs su
101b4: byung ba dang / spos kyi rin po che'i gzugs kyis shing dung kun nas 'khor te/ rgyan yongs su spangs par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi lhas bzhi pa byung ba'o// yang lum bi na'i nags tshal 'di thams
101b5: cad lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / lhab lha ba sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rgyas pa dang ldan par kun nas gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi lhas lnga pa byung ba'o// yang lu mthun
101b6: nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shing thams cad la nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod mngon par grub par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi lhas drug pa byung ba'o/ / yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi pad mo'i
101b7: tshal thams cad du nu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyang kha 'bus te/ sa'i gzhi las 'thon pas/ chu las mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bdun pa byung ba'o// yang 'jig rten gyi
101b8: khams 'di'i 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte bya
102a1: chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di na thal mo sbyar cing 'khod par gyur te/ 'di ni sngon gyi ltas brgyad
102a2: pa byung ba'o/ / yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo
102a3: ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad lag na thogs shing blags sha'i yal ga la mngon du ltas te/ 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par gyur pa 'di ni sngon
102a4: gyi ltas dgu pa byung ba'o/ / yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag nas byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer mang po 'thon
102a5: te/ lum bi na'i nags tshal 'di thams cad snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur te/ 'od gzer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi skyabs rnam par 'phrul
102a6: pa gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ba dang / thog ma bltam pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bcas par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs dang ldan par 'od gzer gyi sgo'i
102a7: dkyil 'khor de dag las sgrar 'thon cing grags par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bcu pa byung ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi lhas bcu po de dag zung bar gyur te/ de byung
102a8: bas 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar lo mo sngon gyi lhas bcu po de dag mthong bas kyang dga' ba'i shugs bsam
102b1: byas ma khyab parab tu zab bo/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo snyam grang khyar can pasar skya gnas nas byung ba'am/ lum bana' nags chal 'dar sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen pa bcu byung bar gyur te/ de dag gyu
102b2: bas sems can tshad med pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi snang bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ / bcu gang zhen 'di ltaste/ sa'i sang na gnas pa'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams
102b3: cang du snang ba rab tu byung ngo / / rin po che'i pad mo kham bye ba la 'bye bar gyur pa'i med pa ma thams cad las snang ba rab tu byung ba ste// bltam pa legs par bltam mo zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pa yang de dag las byung bar gyur
102b4: to/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thog ma sems bskyed pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir snang bar byas te mngon par shar to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub
102b5: sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ngo / / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
102b6: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sgrub cing / ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam
102b7: thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub
102b8: pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba byed pa'i ye
103a1: shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi ye shes khong du
103a2: chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / skye ba dang
103a3: mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / ye shes thugs su chud par mdzad pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to// sngon gyi ltas
103a4: snang ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de dag gi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems dang / bsam pa'i mun pa thibs po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byas so// rigs kyi bu de la
103a5: lha mo sgyu ma shing blag shi'i nags su phyin pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'dul ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa thams cad dang /
103a6: gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu dri nga ba med pa thams cad dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas te tshogs pa byang chub sems
103a7: dpa' la mchod par brtson pa thams cad kyi lus dang / mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i gzi brjid dang dpal dang / kha dog dang gzugs kyis rab tu snang bar byas so// stong gsum gyi stong
103a8: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil du rlag par gyur te zil gyis mnan to/ / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas byung ba'i 'od dang snang ba dag ni 'od
103b1: gzhan gyis nyams par gyur pa med/ bsgribs par gyur pa myed/ chod par gyur ba med thogs par gyur pa myed de/ des phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams
103b2: cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams
103b3: cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te/ lhag ge lham me lha der gnas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ lum bi ne'i nags tshal du byung ba
103b4: dang po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu ma'i lus su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chud cing gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang bar gyur pa de'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
103b5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang / nags tshal gyi ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag
103b6: dang / nags tshal gyi ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang / shing drung rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu'ang lha mo sgyu ma byin cing / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te/ byang chub sems dpa'
103b7: skye ba la sta gon du sdod cing / byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang bar gyur te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i
103b8: rnam par 'phrul pa lu ma bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gnyis pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re la yang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnga' ba'i tshe/
104a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/ rim gror mdzad pa dang / sti stang dang bkur star mdzad de mchod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur te/
104a2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang ldan par ma lus par grag par gyur te/ dper na chu'i drung
104a3: por bu chung ngu'am/ gser gyi rdul phra mo 'am/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba 'am/ chu shin tu dang pa la nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs kyis rab tu brgyad
104a4: pa dang / sprin gyi tshogs 'brug sgra zab mo 'byin pa can yang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang / sngon gyi de bzhin
104a5: gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par yongs su snang / chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad kyang grag par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'odi ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni
104a6: nags tshal du byung ba gsum pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus thams cad dang pa spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang zhing ji snyed cig dang / 'jig
104a7: rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi ming du bya ba ji snyed cig du bcom
104a8: ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de/ zhing gi gzhi ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / dbyibs na ci 'dra ba dang / rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / lhun
104b1: mdzilta buzhig dang ldan par gyur ba dang / ro'i rgyan na ji lta bu dag cig yod par gyur pa dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / yul dang ljongs dang grong rdal gyi d+ha nin ji lta bu dag cig gnas gnas pa dang
104b2: bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mtsho dang lu ma dang rgya mtsho'i rgyan na ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / nam mkha' dang sprin gyi rgyun na rdo lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can gyi gnas na ji lta
104b3: lta bu zhig yod par gyur pa dang / theg pa bstan pa na gang yang ldan par gyur pa dang / bskal pa'i ming dang grangs ni ji snyed cig ces bya bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba ni ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa
104b4: dang / rnam par dag pa na gang du 'du bar gyur pa dang / sems can gyi tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skye gnas ni gang du skyes par gyur pa dang / sems can ji lta bu zhig
104b5: dang 'grogs 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ji lta bu zhig la brten brten pa dang / dge ba'i chos na ji lta bu zhig la brtson par spyod spyod pa dang / chos kyi nan tan na ji lta bu zhig la brtson par byas te/
104b6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas brnyes nas/ sngon sku ni ji snyed cig rnam par
104b7: spyod pa ji lta bu zhig/ cha byad ni rdo lta bu zhig/ longs spyod pa ni ci dang ldan/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ji lta bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/ sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur te/ sngon
104b8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang baspu'i sgo thams cad nas yongs su sdang bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sku gnas de dang de dag tu/ lha mo snum bya
105a1: chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur te/ rigs
105a2: kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bzhi pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sku ni ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems
105a3: dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / ba dog ni ji lta bu zhig dbyibs na ci 'dra ba zhig/ cha byad na ji lta ba zhig/ da rod du ni ji lta bu zhig/ longs spyod ni ci dang ldan/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ji lta bu zhig sku nyams
105a4: su bzhes/ sku'i tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad la gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
105a5: skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba lnga pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ gtang bar dka' ba yongs
105a6: su btang ba 'am/ zhabs dang phyag yongs su btang ba 'am/ snyan dang shangs yongs su btang ba 'am/ ljags dang tshems yongs su btang ba 'am/ spyan dang dbu yongs su btang ba'am/ sha dang khrag
105a7: yongs su btang ba 'am/ rus pa dang rkang yongs su btang ba 'am/ mkhal ma dang thugs yongs su btang ba 'am/ lpags pa dang bri yongs su btang ba 'am/ phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su btang ba 'am/
105a8: sras po dang sras mo dang btsun mo yongs su btang ba 'am/ sku yongs su btang ba 'am/ longs spyod rin po che yongs su btang ba 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul dang khams dang / rgyal ba'i gnas
105b1: yongs su btang ba'am/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba yongs su btang ba'am/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang bye ru dang gser dang dngul yongs su btang ba 'am
105b2: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su btang ba 'am/ mal cha yongs su btang ba 'am/ khang pa dang gzhal med khang yongs su btang ba 'am/ yo byad yongs su btang ba 'am/ de ltar gtong ba'i byang chub
105b3: sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang / rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang / len pa de dag kyang rnam pa ji lta bus len par gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po rnam pa ji lta bu dag yongs su btang bar
105b4: gyur pa dang / yul gyi phyogs gang dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las/ ba spu'i sgo thams
105b5: cad la gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur to/ / slongs mo ba'i sgra de dag kyang grag par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba drug pa'o//
105b6: rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon gyi mtha'i rgyud du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yum gyi sku nas bltam par gyur pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / lhab lhub ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang
105b7: sems can gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / bza' shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / b+hag pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyan mtshan dang ba dan gyi
105b8: rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal ba thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / rol mo dang glu dang / bstod pa dang sil snyan gyi sgra ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
106a1: lha mo snum lum po ni 'i nags tshal du byen pa'i tshe/ lum bi ni nags tshal 'dir yongs su byung bar gyur to// mngon par skyes so// 'gro bas rnam par dmigs su yod par byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di/
106a2: ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bdun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod
106a3: las yongs su 'das pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las 'das pa
106a4: 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzhal med khang gi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i/
106a5: 'bru'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po gzugs kyi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/ spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/ dmigs pa thams cad bzang zhing 'thun
106a6: pa'i longs spyod kyang rang ste/ de dag thams cad lha mo sgyu ma'i ru ma nas ma 'dres par 'thon te/ lum bi ne'i nags tshol 'di yongs su brgyan cing kun nas gnas par gyur te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
106a7: dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa lum po ni'i nags tshal du byed ba brgyad pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo d+hu ma'i lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi 'ong brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya gsong
106a8: gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad su gzugs dang mu mdog dang / dbyibs 'dra ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis 'ong bar brgyan pa/ 'od 'dra ba dang / 'od gzer 'a
106b1: b.rab zad/ tshul dang 'grus skabs 'dra ba/ rgyal dang mthu'adra ba rnam par snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang 'thun pa/ 'bar 'du brgyan mtshungs pa mang pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par thangs
106b2: legs pa rgyam po yongs su rjod cing 'thun par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung nga dgu co// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byu
106b3: chub sems dpa' bltam par gyung pa'i dus la bab pa dang / lha mo snga ma'i mdun du 'og gi rdo rje'i gzhilas sa chen po mngon par brtol te/ rin po che'i rgyal po pang mo chen po rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi
106b4: dam pa zhes bya ba/ chub rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje chen po las grub pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dang ldan pa/ ze ba'i rtse mo rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis
106b5: brgyan pa/ mdab ma'i 'phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis brgyan cing shin tu rnam par phye ba/ lo ma'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis byas pa/ snying po mdzes pa
106b6: rin po che yid bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ ze ba'i phreng ba rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po grangs med pa'i dra ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas/
106b7: yongs su yog pa rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje mthu bo ches mi shigs pas ldan kun nas bkab pa/ lha'i ris thams cad kyis kun nas bskor ba/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis spos kyi chu'i sprin gyi char mngon
106b8: par 'bab pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kun nas bskor cing lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba/ dri zi'i dbang po thams cad kyis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i klu'i
107a1: dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i re ro dang sbyar te bstod pa'i sprin gyis mngon par bstod pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs pa thams cad btang zhing
107a2: shin tu btud de phyag bya ba/ nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po thams cad kyi rin po che'i snam bu kun tu spangs te/ nam mkha' kun nas brgyan par bya ba/ mye 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang
107a3: chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su brjod cing rol mo dang glu'i dbyangs la brtson pa dang / nyams rab tu bde bas kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu dga' ba dang
107a4: mos pa skyes pas yongs su blta zhing sgra snyan pa phyung ste/ rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyi char mngon par dbab pa byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi
107a5: ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bcu pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung bar gyur nas de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' 'od tshad med
107a6: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba/ blta na gtar mi phra zhig lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas bltam ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta/ sprin gyi tshogs rum nas glog gi phreng ba
107a7: 'gru ba ltar/ rin po che'i spos dum nas nyi ma shar kha'i sprin ko ltar/ mun pa stug mur nas sgron ma chen po byung ba lta ste mngon par bltam par gyur to// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las
107a8: gzugs brnyan ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / rmi la ma ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / glu ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i chos
107b1: nyid dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i 'od rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa'i chos nyid kyis mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan to// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo cig ni lum bi ni'i nags tshal
107b2: 'di na gnas shing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kha mo gling bzhi paskal pa dang ldan pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das
107b3: r nam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta zhing khong du chud par bya bar gnas pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling dbye ba
107b4: phrag brgya thams cad na'ang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i tshernam par 'phrul pa bye ba zag brtsal la zhing khong du chud par byed do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
107b5: t hams cad du 'dus pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa dag du yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems kyis khong du
107b6: chud par bya ba re res bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi
107b7: zhing gi dul shin tu phra pa rnams kyi khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ t
107b8: shul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed
108a1: kyang / rdul shin tu phra tha thams cad kyi rdul rol zhing gcig nas gcig tu byung ba'i mtha' rnyed par mi rung / ning thams cad kyi zhing rarang byang chub sems dpa' sgrub gcig nas gcig tustsu
108a2: pa yang mu rnyed par mi rung ngo / / ji ltar kha mos 'jig rten gyi khams 'di byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phral pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
108a3: khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la'ang sems kyi skad cig re re'i sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re re la byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' skye
108a4: ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lum bi ne'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga'
108a5: ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su
108a6: ston pa 'di brnyed nas yun ji srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol de'i yang ba snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi thams
108a7: k un nas rin po che zhes bya bar bskal pa mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu 'byung ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang
108a8: b +hag gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
108b1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung / / rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin pa che zhes bya ba dang gleng bzhi pa dbum rtswan snga chags kyi'ang ces bya ba blang ste/ gleng ban para'i 'jam bu'i gling /
108b2: gi dbrangs su rgyal po'i gnas ri rab rnam par dge pa'i rgyan gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal ba'i gnas dang rgyal po rin po che 'ang 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ngo // rgyal ba rin pa che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig
108b3: gi 'od de la bcud ma'i rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang skur ba zhes bya ba mnga'o/ / rigs kyi bu dper na/ gling bzhi bskal pa dang ldan pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du lca ma snum bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum du
108b4: gyur pa/ de bzhin du de'i tshe/ de'i dus na gling bzhi pargyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du'ang rab du dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan
108b5: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste/ thog mar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan
108b6: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus la bab pa dang / bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu dang
108b7: lhan cig tu bza' shing gi rab chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba der byin te/ dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzho nu de yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam
108b8: bar 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de ltar bltam mo/ / de'i tshe bza' shing gi rab chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de'i dbus su pho brang brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs bzang po las
109a1: ba/ / brtsegs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ pho zang brtsegs pa de'i nang du shing 'dod pa thams cad 'byin pa'i yal ga la 'dus te/ lha mo rab tu dga' ba 'dal dbang sbyar ba las bcom ldan 'das
109a2: bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan bltas so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bsam khor ma ma drim med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba sta bon du gnas gnas te/
109a3: byang chub sems dpa' de bltam par gyur ma thag du 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis dri shin tu zhim pa'i spos chu'i bum pa/ me tog dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bas sgrubasil
109a4: te/ de la tshul dang 'thun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab la grangs med pa mchog tu bya bas mchod nas ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od kyi spang du bzhag go/ ma ma des byang chub sems dpa' spang du
109a5: blangs ma thag du/ de'i mod la ma ma de dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po thob par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yul kun tu bltam pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// de thob
109a6: par gyur ma thag du des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal
109a7: pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skyebs rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di la'ang shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis zhugs par gyur te/ de ni dper na ma'i mngal du zhugs ma
109a8: thag pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu'o/ / rnam par thar pa de thob par gyur pas kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ yang dag par bltam pa'i smon lamachen pa
109b1: yang mngon par bsgrubs so/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba byung bar gyur par gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sem pa
109b2: nani khyod kyis de ltar me blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma me bskyed pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de la rnga snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na zung
109b3: med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung bar gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cag yin pa tsam du sems na yang do ltar mi blta ste/ lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu po lum bai ni'i nags tshal na gnas pa
109b4: mo'i mkhor du gyur pa 'di dag yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzho nu'i yum rab tu dga' ba'i 'od
109b5: la dbang phyung ba zhes bya babyung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na' de ltar mi blta ste/ lha mo sgyu ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi
109b6: bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni de'i
109b7: tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni de byin cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par sngang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par
109b8: 'phrul pa rgya mtshol lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthus rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtshol la zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / skad cig thams cad du bral
110a1: bar ma gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
110a2: kyi zhing rgya mtsho shin tu za ba thams cad yod pa la sems kyi skang cig thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la yongs su 'das pa'i ye shes kyi mig gis lta zhing 'od du nang par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyin
110a3: d e dag du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba rgya mtsho de dag kyang lta zhing khong du chud par byed la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho chen po dag la yang lta zhing khong du chud
110a4: par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang sems can rnam par gdul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung bas/ rnam par 'phrul pa
110a5: rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang / / sems kyi skad cig thams cad du lta zhing khong du chud par byed do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rdul shing tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad gcig
110a6: nas gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba ma nor bar mngon du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
110a7: du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi khongs su chung ba'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ de dag du'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin
110a8: tu yangs pa la 'jug go/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang mngon du gyur par lta'o// de bzhin gshegs
110b1: par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos bstan pa nyan// / chos la yang gnyer ba 'ams kyis nan tan du byed do// de nas lum than nags rtsal gyi lha ma gza brjid kya dkyil/
110b2: 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa
110b3: 'di gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bachus par nyas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / // rim gro bskyed cing nga la gang 'dri ba// de dag bdag las rgyal ba'i sras
110b4: nyon cig/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul blta dka' ni bste// chu dang rkyen gyi tshul gyis rnam par bstan// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul bran rab snyed kyi// sngon gyi bskal pa bsam kyis mi khyab dran// bskal pa'i ming
110b5: ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya/ / de la rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu byung // bskal pa'i dang por de bzhin gshegs byung ba// dbang phyug yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no// nags tshal dam pa gser mdog me tog du//
110b6: mgon po de 'khrungs bdag gis mthong bar gyur// ming du dri med skyed pa'i 'od ces bya// de'i mam mkhas par dag gyur te// bltam ma thag tu gser mdog dam pa'i 'od// 'jig rten dbang po bdag
110b7: gis spang du bzhag/ gang zag dam pa spang du bzhag 'tsho yang // de'i spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus te// bsam yas de la g.yas dang g.yon du yang // bltas shing mtha' rnyed mthong bar ma gyur to//
110b8: mtshan rab bzang pos de ni yongs su brgyan// dri med de sku blta na rab sdug ste// rin chen gzugs 'dra bdag gis mthong gyur nas// dga' ba'i shugs drag mtshungs med rnam par 'phel// de'i yon tan dpag
111a1: yas sems sems nas/ / kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel// de'i rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur nas// rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur// rgyal ba'i legs pa rgyam
111a2: dga' smon nas/ / smon lam rgya mtsho bdag gis rab tu bskyed// 'byam klas zhing rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs// ngan song lam rnams kun kyang rnam par bzlog/ zheng rnams 'byam klas kun gyi
111a3: gshegs rnams/ / sa byon bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang // sems can sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir// smon lam rgya mtsho 'i mos btab par gyur// mgon po de las bdag gis chos thas
111a4: nas/ / rnam thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob// bskal pa zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// spyad pa spyod pa de yang rnam par sbyangs// de la mgon po ji snyed byur gyur pa// de dag ma lus bdag gis
111a5: kun kyang mchod/ / rnam thar rgya mtsho 'di ni sbyor byed cing // de dag bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi// stobs bcu mnga' ba ji snyed 'das byung ba// de dag chos kyi
111a6: 'khor lo lo mos bzung / / rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di yang rab tu bsgoms// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran ji snyed pa// rdul rtse 'byam klas kun la rnam par mthong // rdul phran re re la yang rgya mtsho
111a7: ning / / sngan chad rgyal bas sbyangs pa rab tu mthong // zhing rnams 'byam klas de dag kun tu yang // mgon po thugs rgyud gcag la bsam yas pa'i// rnam 'phrul yangs pa yongs su ston mdzad cing /
111a8: nags tshal mchog tu 'khrungs gyur bdag gis mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi zhing rnams la la na// byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya thugs dgongs shing // dga' ldan 'jig rten nyid na bzhugs pa yang // zhing
111b1: rnams byab bsas kyis sa byanag/ shing rnams rnam pa dbyings sran ma 'phrul du// gan yangs pa lta ba'ang bdag gis ma zang // na mang das pa chags kyad bus bzhugs shing // mgan 'a chas nas/
111b2: ston pa'ang de bzhin mthong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi// dbang po sems kyi skad cig re re la// mngon par 'byung zhing shing rgyal drung gshegs dang // sangs rgyas spyod yul yangs pa ston
111b3: pa mthong / / zhing gcig rdul la bsam gyis maM khyab par// yul rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag ston mdzad pas// 'gro chung sems can sdug bsngal 'grol mdzad cing // mi gtsa rnam par 'tshang
111b4: bdag gis mthong / / rdul phran re re'i rtsel mi zad pa'i// rab 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing // dbyangs rnams rgyamatsho mi zad sgrogs mdzad pa// chos sprin rgya chen char 'bebs mdzad pa mthong /
111b5: 'gro ba kun la rnam pa du mar yang // skad cig re rer mya ngan 'das ston pa// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing gcig rdul la bdag gis mthong // rdul gcig bltas kyang nang
111b6: rnams rgya mtsho dang / / rgyal ba 'byung ba ji snyed kun kyang mthong // tshe rabs kun tu lus mang khrag khrig gis// de dag mchod pa'i don du nye bar phyin// zhing tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/
111b7: 'gro rgyud mi zad ji snyed yod pa'i// 'gro ba kun la mngon tu kho mo ni// chos sprin yangs pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs// rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di
111b8: shes kyi/ / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// thams cad bstan pa kho mos nus re skan// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams
112a1: cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di shes par zad na/ / kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i
112a2: maral nas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i smon lam gyi bsam pa yongs
112a3: su skyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud kyi lam yongs su bstan pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur
112a4: gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du pad mo'i nang nas skye ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad gdul ba la
112a5: mngon par mos shing cher skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin yongs su ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba dang /
112a6: rigs su gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan// sod rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na shag kya'i bu mo go pa zhes bya ba
112a7: 'dug gis de'i gar du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba 'khor bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lum bi
112a8: nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i
112b1: dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ lum be na'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song nga //
112b2: yo ga// de nas tshongs dpon gyi bu na bzangs lub pan nags cal gyi lha mo gci brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi dru nas sa//
112b3: grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston
112b4: pa'i de nyid bsgom pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rgya cher bya ba dang / nan tan du bya ba dang / shin tu sbyang ba dang / yongs su bsam pa dang / rnam par dbye ba byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
112b5: 'gro ba'i khang la chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ngo / / der 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba khyim gi lha mo stong phrag bcu
112b6: dang bcas pas bsus nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po shes rab dang ye shes chen pos rnam par gnon pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma
112b7: khyab pa sgom pa la lhag par dmigs pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang ldan pa/ chos yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi spyod yul la spyod pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du mngon par gzhol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
112b8: gyi tshul mtha' yas pas sems can gdul ba la 'jug pa rgyan mi gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par gdul ba la rab tu snang ba'i spobs pa dang /
113a1: ye shes pa dong du bur gso sa thangs cad kyi spyod pa shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i spyod pa ngon du byung ba'i selas dang ldan pa// 'gro ba thabs cad kyi sepas kyi dga' ba rgya mtsha' shugs rnam pa'i/
113a2: 'phel bar bya ba'i smon la pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i lam du zhugs pa/ khyed byin pa legs so// mig phyir glan pa med pas stong ba dang / spyod la ma zam
113a3: cing rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul can khyod la bltas na/ khyod ni ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa bla na med pa rab tu thob ste/ mtshan dang dpe
113a4: byad bzang pos rab tu brgyad pa'i lus dang stobs bcu'i ye shes snang bas brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten du rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / khyod kyi brtson 'grus dang rnam par gnod pa las bltas na/
113a5: khyod ni ring po mi thogs par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon tu gyur par mthong ba dang ldan zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsas
113a6: gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang gi dga' ba mod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mor chud par gyur ro// de yang
113a7: de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / blta ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / gdams ngag ma nor bar blang ba dang / de'i yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul la brtson par byed pas yongs su ma
113a8: spyoskyo/ / phyir myi ldog/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur te/ khyod la bgegs sam/ bar du gcod pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs te/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun
113b1: na gnas pa med pas/ de'i phyir khyod na ring pong mi thogs par sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub mims dpa' yongs
113b2: su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha po mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha mo khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de ltar 'gyur ro// lha mo kho mo ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rnam par
113b3: zhi bas dga' bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi las nyam de ba'i rnam par smin pa'i phyir ldog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i
113b4: las lanan tan tu byed pas dga' ba dang dam pa nyams su tshar bar 'gyur ro/ / nam sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi bde ba'i sbyor bas sems rnam par 'khrugs shing ngang song
113b5: du lhung bar gyur pa 'am/ bde ba'i rgyud na gnas kyang lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba sna tshogs nyams su nyong bar gyur cing / mi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
113b6: kyang shing tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro/ / lha mo 'di lta ste dper na mi shin tu dang gis byams pa zhig la bu cig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur la/ de'i yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa zhig
113b7: mthong na shin tu dang gis byabs pa'i phyir rab tu yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe'ang / sems can rnams las dang
113b8: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du lhung ba zhig mthong na rab tu pi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa yang dag
114a1: bar len pa dus lus zhaganas padapa'i drud mthangs kyi 'angag tan sde ba ma thung tam/ lha dang ma lam gyi drud du lus dang sems pa bad pa nyams sa spong bzhag du byung na/ da'i ma byang chubs pa
114a2: dpa' shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / nyams bde ba dang yid dga' ba dang / rab tu slo ba dang / dga' ba'i yid nyams su bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha mo byang chubasems dpa' rnams ni bdag gi da kyi
114a3: byi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa tha dad
114a4: pa sna tshogs don du gnyer bas ma yin/ 'du shes dang sems dang lnga ba byin ci log tu gyur ba'i dbang gis ma yin/ kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba'i dbang du
114a5: kur bas ma yin/ sred pa dang lta ba'i dbang dgyur bas ma yin/ sems can sna tshogs dang 'dra 'dzi ba'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis sems rnam par 'phel bas ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi dga' bas dang
114a6: bamyong ba po yongs su chags pas ma yin/ sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'khor ba'i drung na 'gre ldog pa ma yin gyi/ lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshon 'khod cing
114a7: sdug bsngal dpag tu med pas shin tu mnar ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cing / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub ste/ de dag snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par
114a8: srub pa'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la brtson zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ngo // de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad
114b1: rnam par bzlog pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa yangs su mal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen pa smon lam mngon par bsgrub ba// de dag bzhin gan
114b2: pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba med de/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang mthong dang
114b3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par grub bo/ / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dang yongs su so shing sems can thams cad kyi skye mched pa chags mthong bar gyur ba'i rtsa/ chos
114b4: kyisu pa dang pa med cing bla na med pa yangs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rngon lam mngon par bsgrub pa/ / sems can rnams kyi lus dang shadang sems kun nas can mongs pa dang ldan pa mthong na/ sems can
114b5: thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sngon lam mngon par bslab te/ sems can gyimached mtshad pa dang / sems yongs sum dag pa mthong // semasan/
114b6: thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yongs su sbyong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas yongs su slo ba med do// lha mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis
114b7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la spyod de/ de ltar spyod pa ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su snyed pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa yin/ byang chub tu sems
114b8: bskyed pa la batha gad pa'i phyir pa dang mar gyur pa yid/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'drad pas mas la zur gyur pa yin/ ngan seng gi gsangasa'i 'jigs pa las srung ba'i phyir ldan cig skyes
115a1: pa'i lha rtag tu bya bzhin 'brang ba lta bur gyur pa yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir mnyan pa chen po lta bur gyur pa yin// bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten thams cad rnam par bzlog par
115a2: phyir skyabs su gyur pa yin/ shin tu bsil ba'i rang bzhin nye bar stobs pas gnas su gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par byed pas mu stegs su gyur pa yin/ chos rin po che'i gling du
115a3: skyel bas mgon myed par gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gis sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas me tog tu gyur pa yin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od yangs pa rab tu 'gyed pas/
115a4: rgyan du gyur pa yin/ kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dam pa byed pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan du byed pas phrad na legs pa yin/ yan lag dam pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su chad
115a5: pa'i lus dang ldan pas kun tu bzang ba yin/ blta na mi 'thun pa med pas gtad mi phra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa yin// ye shes kyi 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i
115a6: phyir snang ba byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin/ bdud kyi las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir dmag dpon du gyur pa yin/ shes rab kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba
115a7: rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa yin/ chos kyi nam mkha' la blo'i zla ba 'char bar byed pas zla bar gyur pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bebs pas sprin du gyur pa yin te
115a8: lha mo de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal khyim gyi lha mo
115b1: stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang byug pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi char yid kyi rang bzhin mngon par
115b2: pabastA/ kun nas bskor cing rjes su 'brangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i khang par 'gro ba'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing /
115b3: sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// rgyal ba'i ye shes nyi ma'i rnams// bar 'ga' zhig na 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa bye ba mang bas kyang // khyod kyi zhal mthong shin tu dka'// 'jig te/
115b4: sa rig sadongs pa la// khyod kyi ye shes gnyi chen yin// mi shes rab rib bsgris pa'i// 'jig rten byin ci log gzigs nas// thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de// khyod ni rang byung nyid du zhugs/
115b5: khyod kyi dgongs pa rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtson// dge ba shes bsnyen bkur bsten mdzad cing // lus srog phangs par mdzad mi mnga'// khyod ni 'jig rten rten mi mnga'// 'du 'dzi
115b6: sa mnga' gnas mi sa nga/ / 'dres pa ma mchis mi rten pas// dgongs pa thogs med nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod mdzad cing // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od bzangs so//
115b7: ye shes sgron me rab 'gyed pa// 'jig rten tshad med kun tu 'char// 'jig rten nas kyang 'phags mi mdzad// 'jig rten chos kyis yod mi 'gro/ chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod// mkha
115b8: sar bu ji bzhin no/ / bskal pa'i ma 'bar ma bzhin du// rtag tu 'bar bas rab tu brtson// me lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod par mdzad// seng ge bzhin du shin tu dpa'//
116a1: brtson 'grus rnam par gnon pa brtan// ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan// gzhan gyis thub pa med par spyod// chos dbyings rgyamatsha 'di dgan// rgya mtsho tshul rnams ji snyed pa// der yang dag
116a2: ba shes bsnyen bkur bas/ / dpa' ba khyod ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lham mya ngan mad pa'i dpal gyis/ tshong dpon mi bu nor bzangs 'tshigs su bcad pade
116a3: dag gis mngon par bstod de/ / de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i
116a4: 'od byin te/ nang du song nas shag kya'i bu mo go ba mthong bar 'dod de kun tu bltas na shag kya'i bu mo go ba byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbus na
116a5: stan rin po che byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas sdang bar byed pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
116a6: skal ba mnyam pa/ sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin tu bsdus pa/ tshig snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'i dang tshul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mngon tu bya bas shin tu bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang
116a7: chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la don 'thun pas shin tu bzung ba/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas srad bu mo yongs su bzung ba'i tshul bcangs pa/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang
116a8: ba yongs su dag par byas pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin par byas pa stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa
116b1: thang / / bungs gang brag btu ban pa dag kyang blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bying myi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa' bar la tu byed pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems da
116b2: bslab pa la gnan gyi dring mi 'dzag pa/ chags pa thams cad bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor gyi dga' ba thams cad kyis skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags pa med pa
116b3: yongs su dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon tu bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba/ chags pa'i lam thams cad las shin tu 'das
116b4: chos kyi sku la legs par sprul pas rnam par spyod pa 'jig rten thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon par phyogs pa/ bsod nams rgya mtsho'i dri ma med pas yongs su byung ba'i sem
116b5: dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis shin tu byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi shugs yangs pas ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis rab tu snang ba
116b6: yang dag par bskyed pa sha stag go/ / de nas tshongad dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shag kya'i bu mo ge ba gdan pa der phyin nas/ shag kya'i bu mo go ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mdun du
116b7: 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags ma bdag gis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor yang 'khor ba'i
116b8: skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khong du chud la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sdang ba yang rab tu thob la byang
117a1: chub sems dpa' spyod pal yang rgyu ma gcad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lam
117a2: gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod pa dang / chos kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang ldan yang / gzugs kyi lus
117a3: dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams
117a4: cad brjod du ma mchis par yang dag par rtogs la/ ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshi ga thams cad brjod pas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sems can
117a5: med par yang rab tu shes la/ sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las kyang mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par yang khong du chud la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
117a6: cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad la las dang rnam par smin pa ma mchis par rtogs la/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang
117a7: bying ba ldog pa ma 'tshal to/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / shag kya'i bu mo go bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i chos
117a8: nyid dam pa de lta bus dri bar sems dpa' 'gas legs so/ / dri ba brjod pa de dag kyang kun tu bzang ba'i smon lam dang spyod pa la mngo tu gyur ba'i tshig go// rigs kyi bu de bas na legs par nyon la shin tu
117b1: yid la zung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi byen gyis bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi dang
117b2: dang 'dra ba/ ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rlabs po che la brten pa dang / mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i
117b3: bsam pa rlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pas rab tu bstan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa chen po thos pa rab tu thob pa dang / dus gsum gyi
117b4: de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rab
117b5: tu thob pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa ste/ rigs kyi
117b6: bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu de la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang
117b7: ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos de dag thob par gyur nas kyang mi zad pa'i tshul du mngon par bsgrub cing / bsgom pa dang shin tu rgya che bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing rnam pa bcus
117b8: mngon par dga' bar byed do/ / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / 'khor ba'i yod byed don du mi gnyer ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang /
118a1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba dang / srid pa rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid dang / gnas med par
118a2: chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa med pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil
118a3: 'khor sgrib pa med pa shin tu stangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par byed do// de nas shag kya'i bu mo go bas
118a4: don de nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gi don zhugs shing // dge ba shes dam
118a5: pa bsnyen brtson g.yo dang sgra med pa/ / ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can// de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mi 'phrul 'dra 'di yin// gang rnams mos parlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing //
118a6: de'i khongs su dus gsum 'jog rten chung ba dang // zhing dade sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa// ye shes 'od byed spyod pa de dag 'di yin no// gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dbus med la/
118a7: kun nas nyon mongs drims mgos rab dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan byung gyur pa// de dag spyod pa mig 'phrul gzhi'i rnam pa 'dra// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bas ma yas dang
118a8: yon tan rgya mtsho yid gsal ldan pa nyer brtan pa/ / de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho'i lus dag snying po ste// 'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun
118b1: byas/ / zas kyi 'brags nyan kyang gang rnams sangams gang // chos tshul rjes sa stegs par shes rab 'a kyi smod// de dag 'gro bar 'dagasal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin// gang rnams phyags bcur
118b2: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ / gzhan dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing // bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes byed pa// sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul
118b3: 'di yin no/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam thar yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing // de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang po dang // smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa// myig 'phrul lta bu de
118b4: dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin rlabs te// phyi mtha'i skal bar spyod byed kun tu bzang po rnams// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa/
118b5: chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// gang rnams ye shes nyi ma'i snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// 'gro ba nyam nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas// 'gro ba'i mun pa bstsal cing bstan pa 'char 'byung ba/
118b6: nyi ma'i lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// skyes dgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'gre ldog mthong gyur nas// yid gsal 'khor ba'i rnams phyir zlog la rab gnas shing // chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed
118b7: pa/ / spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod// tshul 'dir bslabs pa de dag mtha' dang dbus med pa'i// lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te// gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i
118b8: rang lus tshad med pas/ / sred pa'i rgya mtsho dgan 'gro mang yongs smin byed// byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste// mos pa sna tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas// 'grol bsam
119a1: pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing / / brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dral// de nas shag kya'i bu mo go bas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
119a2: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul thob pa'o// nor bzangs
119a3: kyis spras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa rigs kyi bu
119a4: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong zhing khong du chud
119a5: par byed do/ / bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang
119a6: tu shes so/ / mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las dang mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las rnam par smin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang
119a7: rab tu shes so/ / de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so// myi dge ba dang 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas
119a8: pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de dag
119b1: gangag ca sa yongs su 'dus pa dang / sngun tamams yongs su 'das par las yangs su grangs pa yang rabatugs sa// bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi gang brjod du mang pa' rdul shin tu phra ba sad pa
119b2: dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so//
119b3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du
119b4: gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs rdzogs par
119b5: mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ / 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / btul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu
119b6: shes so/ / mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho
119b7: thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de
119b8: ngag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so/ / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so// lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag
120a1: ba'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis
120a2: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud pa ji snyed ci yod pa de dgakyang rab tu shes so//
120a3: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtsa ba'i rnam par thar pa'o sa/ ji snyingad cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang
120a4: rab tu shes so/ / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so//
120a5: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
120a6: de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so//
120a7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam rnam pa tha dad bdag kyang bzu shes
120a8: so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang
120b1: rab tu shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i can rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so//
120b2: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i shugs drag pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab
120b3: ku shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems
120b4: dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsgom pa'i rgyud kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su byangs pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so//
120b5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i da bang dag kyang rab tu shes so//
120b6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'bar ba'i/ ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpas yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'as yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye
120b7: shes kyang rab tu shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya yang rab tu shes so// byang chub
120b8: sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge'i rngan rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so//
121a1: byang chub sems dpa de dag sems kyi sang cig raral tang nga'adzin rgyams sna chags thob par byang ba dag kyang rab tu shes pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul zab par byed pa dag kyang rab tu
121a2: shes so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye
121a3: shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams zhing rgya mtsho rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// chos rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems
121a4: can rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag
121a5: kyang rab tu shes so/ / smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mos ni ji ltar
121a6: mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te/ khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu rgyud de/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs
121a7: pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas
121a8: gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi skal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar
121b1: shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu chud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / me mdzad
121b2: k yi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu za ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu chud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtshon mas ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
121b3: phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten
121b4: g yi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu rgud pa dag ni gnas pa'i 'jig rten
121b5: gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
121b6: c ad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab
121b7: tu shes so/ / phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa'i de bzhin du phyogs kun tu 'od rnam
121b8: p ar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho
122a1: dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
122a2: t hams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
122a3: klas pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil bya ba rnams dang / 'jig gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye
122a4: brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams glong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab dang / 'jig rten gyi
122a5: khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rta bag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag
122a6: kyang rab tu shes so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis rgyan pa 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi/
122a7: dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rjes su dran no// sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing
122a8: khong du chud do/ / sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la 'ang shes shing khong du chud do// skal ba mtha' dang dbus myed par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing
122b1: khong du chad do/ / zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud ngo do// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyid bzhin gshes
122b2: rnams la bsnyen bkung mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang shas shing khong du chud do/ / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim grong mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du
122b3: chud do/ / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// ston byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyas pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong
122b4: duchung ngo / / yo byad la dbang sgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan du mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sbyin
122b5: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes
122b6: shes shing khong du chud do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsam
122b7: gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ / shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud
122b8: do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad sku'i gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes sheng khong du chud do// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil
